product_description: Rich creamy & vanilla marshmallow, featuring apple blossom.
Smell of ylang-ylang & tunisian orange blossom
Juicy pomegranate grains, iced freshness and shinning yuzo
Blend of citrus, brazilian purple passion fruit, madagascan vanilla orchid & italian pine
Pink pepper jasmine & amber pachouli floral, spicy, sensual and garmand
Dreamy vanilla coconut in cream coupled with juicy, swetness of pear and bright bergamot
